Release Version: ZMap 0.1.72
Release Date: 30 November 2009

(Last release was on 23/10/2009)

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved

ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_10_23.shtml: new zmap release notes for 23 October 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_10_23.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 23/10/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.4393/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: replace local revcompdna func with utils copy.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapDNA.c: redo recomp function to be much simpler.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem.c: fix bad, bad bug, calling destroy twice results in slice chain corruption.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: fix up predefined styles so that dna and peptide sequence are only drawn on the forward strand.
  • src/zmapManager/zmapManager.c: change logic so if no views connect then zmap window is destroyed.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapConfigLoader.c: add missing convertor for frame mode.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: improved error handling when config file contains no feature sets.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: fix logic for making columns for different frames.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: fix bug where we thought dna was displayed but it wasn't.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowState.c: need to test if col is _shown_ not just whether its strand specific.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.h, zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet_I.h: add code to test for reverse strand display.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: fix bug for when there is no dna in peptide func.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: fix missing intialiser for string.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h, zmapUtils/zmapCoords.c: add new coords functions and file.
  • src/zmapApp/zmapAppwindow.c: add code to check for start/end separately from sequence.
  • src/zmapUtils/Makefile.am: add zmapCoords.c to build.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h, zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: remove redundant context param from dna calls, fix bug where object is partly off end of dna, make calls return NULL for no dna.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapDNA.c: fix rubbish compiler warnings.
  • bug.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowMenus.c: handle NULL return from dna routines.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: change args to fit new ones for getting dna.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemText.c: fix up dna call, now returns NULL like it always should have.

  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: file created from fileServer.c; file replaced by pipe

  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: fix stupid assert bug.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapUtilsLog.h: add macros to do gtk like 'return_if_fail' testing.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: fix ghastly uninitialised variable bug and rationalise some of the code.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapConfigLoader.c: added scripts-dir to [ZMap] ...configKeyEntryStruct
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF_P.h: add code to allow separate parsing of sequence from file.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: add code to parse sequence separately and simplify handling of parser state/errors.
  • src/zmapGFF/gffparser.c: fix up create call for new params.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapGFF.h: create parser without args now, add feature args later.
  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: fix up code for new GFF parser args.
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: fix up for new GFF parser args.
  • src/zmapServer/file/fileServer.c: fix up context call, was wrong, also sequence getting call, but this is still bugged cvs diff zmapServer/file/fileServer.c double free somewhere.
  • src/zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c: do return an error if getting dna is unsupported, just return a message.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: fix bump handling when bump not set yet.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: remove faulty setting of sequence size, it is _not_ the window size.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix bug in feature sizing, must be _relative_ to block.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextFeature.c: fix text colouring for text.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapConfigStrings.h: fix missing dec.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • wmake/: DARWIN_BLXNEW_DEF, LINUX_BLXNEW_DEF: add files to compile new blixem from SeqTools subdir instead of w9
  • w1/: getopt.c, getopt1.c: remove getopt files, these functions are now part of the Std C library so they are no longer required.
  • wmake/truemake: remove getopt files from build, no longer required as getoptNNN are in Std C library.
  • wh/fmapsegdump.h: moving file to w7
  • w7/fmapsegdump.h: moved from wh
  • wmake/: DARWIN_BLXNEW_DEF, LINUX_BLXNEW_DEF: add comment about new blixem build from SeqTools.
  • w1/acein.c: two small formatting changes, thought I was going to do more.
  • wh/gff.h: superceded by w7/fmapsegdump.h
  • w4/gifcommand.c: fix bug caused by wrong number of command options in array..ugh.
  • w7/fmap_.h: move some decs to fmapsegdump.h.
  • w7/fmapsegdump.h: use KEY instead of strings, still more to do on func. prototype once gffv3 requirements clearer.
  • w7/fmapsegdumpdas.c: add new args to dumping function.
  • w7/fmapcontrol.c: add new params to dumpgff call and tidy up headers.
  • w7/fmapsegdump.c: add parent/child flags to dump call, add new params to dumpseg code.
  • w7/fmapsegdumpgff.c: not finished, waiting for wormgroup decisions, set up so->so_id tables, add parent/child/multiline flags and code, get basic worm support going.
  • w7/smapconvert.c: record parent seg type where we need it for later seg dumping.
  • w4/dump.c: minor format changes, was waiting for user to reproduce dumping error.
  • w9/: blixem_.h, blxFetch.c, blxparser.c, blxview.c: Fixed a bug where blixem didn't work if sequences were the wrong case (RT 148580)
  • w9/dotterng.c: Used for non-graphic dotter version, contains place-holder graphic funcs.
